CheckPoint: Yo-Yo
A yo-yo is resting on a horizontal surface. A string tightly wrapped around the central part of the yo-yo. The string can be pulled in one of several possible ways which are shown in the diagram.
Which of the directions of the pull – if any – will make the yo-yo rotate clockwise? The "extensions" of the strings are shown as dashed lines.
String A only
Strings A and B only
String C only
String D only
Strings C and D only
None of the strings will make the yo-yo rotate clockwise
Each of the strings will make the yo-yo rotate clockwise
